description:
Big problems for the penultimate episode as none of the cast schedules match up. That and exhausted animators make for a crisis that the Tesaguri members solve by recycling footage from the first 10 episodes and then re-dubbing them in various ways!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima made no Eizou de Asobou
Let`s Play with All the Footage up to Now
今までの映像で遊ぼう
